title: Dark Mending
desc:
Post 1956
- This card requires you to input the same number twice. (Both inputs take a turn.)
- Inflict **Gloom** 2 upon yourself.
- Discard every card in your hand that wasn't part of your starting hand.
- Then, target a player. Half of the discarded cards (rounded up) are chosen at random to fill their hand. This bypasses any ğŸ›¡ï¸ **Shield**, ğŸ˜ƒ **Happy**, and ğŸ’ª **Muscle** they may have.
